BTF 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Carry out a validation

    run_valid.Rd

    Carry out a validation

    run_valid(
  modern_elevation = NULL,
  modern_species = NULL,
  n_folds = 1,
  use_uniform_prior = FALSE,
  dx = 0.2
)

    Arguments

    modern_elevation

    A dataframe of modern elevations

    modern_species

    A dataframe of modern counts (to be sorted with sort_modern)

    n_folds

    Number of folds for CV

    use_uniform_prior

    change prior on elevation to be uniform

    dx

    The elevation interval for spacing the spline knots. Defaults to 0.2.

    Value

    A table of validation results

    Contents

    Developed by The package maintainer.
